title: Fixture 01 · Stabilize Timeline Sync
description:
Short summary: Stabilize scenario covering the timeline sync workflow inside the Beads VSCode test harness.

Details: Exercise multi-root scenarios so decorators show up across different workspace folders without caching collisions. This stays strictly within the disposable test workspace but must mimic noisy data so the parent extension UI can be validated quickly.

title: Fixture 02 · Instrument Notebook Inspector
description:
Short summary: Instrument scenario covering the notebook inspector workflow inside the Beads VSCode test harness.

Details: Drive simulated traffic with dozens of concurrent bead updates to reveal race conditions in the panel refresh logic. This stays strictly within the disposable test workspace but must mimic noisy data so the parent extension UI can be validated quickly.

title: Fixture 03 · Stress-Test Dependency Heatmap
description:
Short summary: Stress-Test scenario covering the dependency heatmap workflow inside the Beads VSCode test harness.

Details: Validate that breadcrumb chips render deterministic colors even when dependency graphs change faster than UI polls. This stays strictly within the disposable test workspace but must mimic noisy data so the parent extension UI can be validated quickly.

title: Fixture 04 · Polish Notification Bridge
description:
Short summary: Polish scenario covering the notification bridge workflow inside the Beads VSCode test harness.

Details: Force incremental sync failures to confirm the extension surfaces actionable remediation text for testers. This stays strictly within the disposable test workspace but must mimic noisy data so the parent extension UI can be validated quickly.

title: Fixture 05 · Audit AI Coach Panel
description:
Short summary: Audit scenario covering the ai coach panel workflow inside the Beads VSCode test harness.

Details: Ensure telemetry batching includes parent references so QA can correlate edge cases with upstream beads. This stays strictly within the disposable test workspace but must mimic noisy data so the parent extension UI can be validated quickly.

title: Fixture 06 · Document Batch Importer
description:
Short summary: Document scenario covering the batch importer workflow inside the Beads VSCode test harness.

Details: Run command palette entry points repeatedly to benchmark activation cost after hot reloads. This stays strictly within the disposable test workspace but must mimic noisy data so the parent extension UI can be validated quickly.

title: Fixture 07 · Profile History Viewer
description:
Short summary: Profile scenario covering the history viewer workflow inside the Beads VSCode test harness.

Details: Hit API adapters with malformed records so content assist gracefully degrades without throwing stack traces. This stays strictly within the disposable test workspace but must mimic noisy data so the parent extension UI can be validated quickly.

title: Fixture 08 · Optimize Search Palette
description:
Short summary: Optimize scenario covering the search palette workflow inside the Beads VSCode test harness.

Details: Verify accessibility annotations remain intact when high-contrast themes flip mid-session. This stays strictly within the disposable test workspace but must mimic noisy data so the parent extension UI can be validated quickly.

title: Fixture 09 · Validate Link Preview
description:
Short summary: Validate scenario covering the link preview workflow inside the Beads VSCode test harness.

Details: Feed giant markdown payloads to reveal scrollbar jitter and stale state, mirroring real notebook workflows. This stays strictly within the disposable test workspace but must mimic noisy data so the parent extension UI can be validated quickly.

title: Fixture 10 · Sandbox Status Board
description:
Short summary: Sandbox scenario covering the status board workflow inside the Beads VSCode test harness.

Details: Confirm offline queueing keeps dependencies consistent while background sync is intentionally paused. This stays strictly within the disposable test workspace but must mimic noisy data so the parent extension UI can be validated quickly.
